content: mosaic crochet blanket come create this beautiful mosaic blanket with me finished size lap throw approximately 33 by 55 see end of pattern for more sizing options gauge blocked link 6mm/j crochet hook youtube tutorial https //www youtube com/watch v=b 12 cs by 12 row = 4 inches azked0ewrm&t=1951s 1 www unrulystitch com- instagram @unrulystitch mosaic crochet blanket difficulty level advanced beginner/intermediate materials ◆ mc 10 skeins berroco vintage chunky bulky weight #5 1300yds/1000g 50% acrylic 40% wool 10% nylon ◆ cc 4 skeins james c brett marble chunky bulky weight #5 1364yds/800g 100% acrylic ◆ crochet hooks 6mm/j ◆ scissors ◆ tapestry needle **please remember if making a different size other than the lap throw you will need more yarn for the size you choose glossary chain chain slip_stitch slip_stitch single_crochet single_crochet double_crochet double_crochet drop down double_crochet drop down double_crochet you will skip the next st of the row you are working on jump down 2 row to the corresponding st double_crochet in the front loop of the st completing your drop down double_crochet blo back loop only flo front loop only 2 www unrulystitch com- instagram @unrulystitch pattern want to make a larger size got to page 10 there will be a chart with stitch count row count and your starting chain number there are no yardage amounts for these size as they have not been tested yet be advised to judge the amount of yarn you see necessary to complete the size you choose in this pattern you will be using 2 colors color a mc and color b cc noted in the chart below each row is worked with the right side facing you at all times meaning you will work from right to left no turning but fastening off at the end of each row you will be alternating colors a and b every row throughout the pattern by working all single_crochet in blo and making your double_crochet in the same st 1 row below flo you will achieve your mosaic design *note in the chart below each box represents a st if the box is empty without text it means to single_crochet in blo an x in the box is a drop down double_crochet and single_crochet in the box means to single_crochet through both loops the plus 2 represent the edge stitches 3 www unrulystitch com- instagram @unrulystitch pattern the pattern is worked in a multiple of 12 st plus 2 and repeating row 3-18 16 row numerous times to complete your desired length with your color a white you will make a sl knot and chain 83 r1 in 2nd chain from hook single_crochet in chain single_crochet in each chain along ch2 and fasten_off your work you will have 82 st with color b mc84 go back to the first single_crochet you made on previous row join your color b r2 ch1 single_crochet in the same st you just joined through both loops single_crochet in next 80 st in blo single_crochet in both
